text.Department of Modern Languages and Liter: Department of Modern Languages and Literatures

courseSection0.text:
Minor Admission Requirements
None
Minor Requirements
None
Prerequisite Courses
None

courseSection0.text0:
Complete the following: 
ITA3420 - Italian Composition (3)
ITA3760 - Advanced Italian Oral Communication (3)
courseSection0.text1: ITA 3760- A native or near-native speaker must substitute an alternate upper division course for the advanced oral communication course.

courseSection1.text0:
Earn at least 12 credits from the following types of courses: 
Select four upper division Italian language courses offered in the Department of Modern Languages.
courseSection1.text1: Approval of a departmental advisor is required prior to registration.
courseSection1.text2: A list of approved restricted elective courses is found in the myKnight audit.

li.A grade of \"C\" (2.0) or better is requ: A grade of "C" (2.0) or better is required in all courses used to satisfy the minor.
li.At least 12 hours used in the minor must: At least 12 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the department.
li.A maximum of 6 hours of study abroad cre: A maximum of 6 hours of study abroad credit may be applied to the minor at the program director's discretion.
li.No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit): No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
li.Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study: Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor without departmental permission.

courseSection0.text:
Other Requirements

A grade of "C" (2.0) or better is required in all courses used to satisfy the minor.
At least 12 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the department.
A maximum of 6 hours of study abroad credit may be applied to the minor at the program director's discretion.
No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor without departmental permission.
